entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Manicouagan
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
